Title: Doña Francisquita
Writer: José Luis Colina, Guillermo Fernández Shaw (play), Federico Romero (play), José Santugini, Ladislao Vajda (dialogue)
Actors: Mirtha Legrand, Armando Calvo, Antonio Casal, Manolo Morán
Plot: Francisquita, owner of a pastry shop with her widowed mother, loves Fernando, but he only has eyes for Aurora, a temperamental artist. It's his father who courts Francisquita, despite her efforts to interest the son. Aided by Fernando's friend, she will follow the steps of the parallel story in the famed Zarzuela of the same name to make him jealous.
